name: Gahleitner Carola
description: Welcome to our new holiday apartment! Our apartment is 65m² and is suitable for wheelchair users. We are situated approx. 3km from the centre of town in a quiet, traffic free area.
Price includes bed linen, electricity, heating. Excludes a final cleaning charge.

Drive straight ahead at the rounabout at Mayrhofen until the junction for Tux-Ginzling. Keep going straight on in the direction of Ginzling for approx. 300 metres, take the first right and carry on approx. 100 metres until the next junction. Turn left, and we are the first house on the left.

makesOffer.name: Apartment, shower, toilet, 2 bed rooms
makesOffer.description: Holiday apartment for from 4 to 7 people. 2 bedrooms (1 double room, 1 three-bed room with bunk), 1 completely furnished kitchen-living room: 25 m ² with extendable double couch, Kaffemaschine, dishwasher, microwave, SAT TV, radio; 1 bathroom with YOU / WC, foehn, bath towels + towels, 1 separate WC.
